name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare - Zomboss Down
summary: Zomboss Down features a brand new Gardens & Graveyards map "Cactus Canyon," where Zombies have crash landed in the desert and need to fight their way to a local golf course and destroy a secret Plant facility located under the 18th hole. 8 new characters have also been added as well as hundreds of new CRAAAZY customization items to collect! In addition, this pack also contains hundreds of tuning/balance changes, and bug fixes.
